title: Background for literature: The Lady of the lake
brief_description: Scottish scenes are used to illustrate excerpts from Sir Walter Scott’s poem “Lady of the lake”. The film, which includes a brief outline of the author’s life, is intended to demonstrate the concept that literature has its roots in actual places and people.
